snippet.title: Phantom Blade Zero - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the world premiere of Phantom Blade Zero, a new Action RPG featuring deep and dark art style, fast paced combat, and a fictitious world blending Chinese martial arts and steampunk! 
Be the Dark Raider exiled by "the Order", embark on the path of vengeance, and uncover the darkest secrets of Wulin!
Pre Registration: https://www.s-gamestudio.com/

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PhantomBladeZero
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/phantombladezero
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pbzero_official
Discord: https://discord.gg/pbz
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@phantombladezero
